scripts.cleanup:full: find . -type d \( -name 'node_modules' -o -name '.next' -o -name 'out' -o -name 'dist' -o -name 'test-results' \) -exec rm -rf {} + && echo 'Full cleanup completed!'
scripts.cleanup:build: find . -type d \( -name '.next' -o -name 'out' -o -name 'dist' -o -name 'test-results' \) -exec rm -rf {} + && echo 'Build cleanup completed!'
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup:full && npm run cleanup:npm
scripts.dev:test: npm run test:jest:frontend && npm run test:jest:backend && npm run test:chai && npm run test:cucumberjs
scripts.docker-build-dev: docker build -t codebloxes/codeblox-dev -f .docker/dockerfiles/Dockerfile-dev . && docker push codebloxes/codeblox-dev
scripts.docker-build-dev-postgres: docker build -t codebloxes/codeblox-dev-postgres -f .docker/dockerfiles/Dockerfile-dev-postgres . && docker push codebloxes/codeblox-dev-postgres
scripts.docker-build-prod: docker build -t codebloxes/codeblox-prod -f .docker/dockerfiles/Dockerfile . && docker push codebloxes/codeblox-prod
scripts.docker-build: concurrently "npm run docker-build-dev" "npm run docker-build-dev-postgres" "npm run docker-build-prod"
scripts.docker-x-buildx-create: docker buildx rm codeblox-builder || true && docker buildx create --name codeblox-builder --use
scripts.docker-build-all: npm run docker-x-buildx-create && concurrently "npm run docker-x-build-prod" "npm run docker-x-build-dev" "npm run docker-x-build-dev-postgres"
scripts.docker-x-build-cb-prod: npm run docker-x-buildx-create && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t codebloxes/codeblox-prod:latest -f ./.docker/dockerfiles/Dockerfile --push .
scripts.docker-x-build-cb-dev: npm run docker-x-buildx-create && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t codebloxes/codeblox-dev:latest -f ./.docker/dockerfiles/Dockerfile-dev --push .
scripts.docker-x-build-cb-dev-postgres: npm run docker-x-buildx-create && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t codebloxes/codeblox-dev-postgres:latest -f ./.docker/dockerfiles/Dockerfile-dev-postgres --push .
